resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108291</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108291</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202580</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Investing in the Stock Market</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Investierung in der Börse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Investissement au Marché boursier</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Investing no mercado conservado em estoque</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Investendo nel mercato azionario</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επένδυση στο χρηματιστήριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inversión en la Bolsa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This thrust of this lesson plan is to have students learn about the three major US stock markets through buying imaginary stock.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Schub dieses Lektionplanes soll 
Kursteilnehmer über die drei Haupt-US Börsen durch das Kaufen
des eingebildeten Vorrates erlernen lassen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette poussée de ce plan de leçon doit faire se 
renseigner à des étudiants sur les trois marchés boursiers principaux des
USA en achetant les actions imaginaires.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta pressão desta planta da lição deve mandar 
estudantes aprender sobre os três mercados conservados em estoque 
principais dos E. U. com da compra do estoque imaginário.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa spinta di questo programma di lezione deve 
fare imparare agli allievi circa i tre mercati azionari principali 
degli Stati Uniti through comprando le azione immaginarie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η ώθηση αυτού του σχεδίου μαθήματος είναι να 
υπάρξουν οι σπουδαστές να μάθουν για τα τρία σημαντικά 
αμερικανικά χρηματιστήρια μέσω της αγοράς του φανταστικού 
αποθέματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este empuje de este plan de la lección es hacer 
que los estudiantes aprendan sobre las tres bolsas principales de
los E.E.U.U. con comprar la acción imaginaria.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commercio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχείρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Negocio</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:BILL ESTES
FN:BILL ESTES
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202580</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108291</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/investing-in-the-stock-market</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
